files.patch:
@@ -4333,1 +4333,2 @@
-// Apply Maven Publishing (if enabled) right after all projects are defined.
+// Apply Maven Publishing to all projects (if enabled).
+// Need to be done after all projects were defined that should be published.
@@ -5187,0 +5188,4 @@
+    // Configures the maven publication (if enabled) for all projects of this compile target.
+    // Will run after the buildModulesTask.
+    configureMavenPublication(moduleProjList, t, buildModulesTask)
+
@@ -5375,6 +5380,0 @@
-    // ============================================================
-
-    configureMavenPublication(moduleProjList, t, buildModulesTask)
-
-    // ============================================================
-

@@ -89,1 +89,1 @@
-ext.configureMavenPublication = { List<Project> projects, CompileTarget t, Task dependingTask ->
+ext.configureMavenPublication = { List<Project> projects, CompileTarget t, Task previousTask ->
@@ -111,0 +111,2 @@
+            dependsOn previousTask
+
@@ -121,1 +123,1 @@
-        def modularPublicationJarTask = project.tasks.register("modularPublicationJar${t.capital}", Jar) {
+        project.tasks.register("modularPublicationJar${t.capital}", Jar) {
@@ -129,2 +131,0 @@
-
-        dependingTask.dependsOn(modularPublicationJarTask)
